    public class SubcategoryListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter
implements android.widget.Filterable, android.support.v7.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener
    Created by danielastamati on 29/01/16.

    Adapter class for rendering Subcategory list item. Implements SearchView.OnQueryTextListener
